=== Who am I ===
I'm Maarten Lankhorst, sponsored by canonical to work on ubuntu and upstream. Currently I'm maintaining the <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-wine/+archive/ppa|ubuntu-wine ppa]]</nowiki>, and doing side projects related to nouveau when I find the time for it. I'm also involved in projects related to optimus support for ubuntu.
